data.message: My friend's FB shows hardly anything to people who are not authorized on her page. My FB shows soooo much including all pics and all friends to people who are not authorized. How can I change my page to show less to non-friends?

replies.message: Good question, Kathy! You can control who sees your content using privacy settings. Learn more about how to access some of the most widely used privacy tools here: http://on.fb.me/1CX4Dxz. We hope that helps! -Rose

Faecbook..... is there a way to get in touch with someone, as in a real person not a  form or inquiry, as to why some content is removed even though it does  not violate the terms of service but other content that clearly violates  terms of service is not removed??
